languages.text: {n}Дернув прикованной рукой, Соломон поднимает на вас взгляд и сурово приказывает:{/n} "Сними".
{n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."
languages.original_text: {n}Дернув прикованной рукой, Соломон поднимает на вас взгляд и сурово приказывает:{/n} "Сними".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."
{n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."
{n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."
{n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."
{n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne tente de retirer sa main d'un coup sec.{/n} « Enlevez-moi ça, » {n}ordonne-t-il en vous lançant un regard sévère.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne tente de retirer sa main d'un coup sec.{/n} « Enlevez-moi ça, » {n}ordonne-t-il en vous lançant un regard sévère.{/n}

languages.text: {n}手錠を引き寄せるようにして、ソロモーンはあなたを見上げ、厳しい口調で命じた。{/n}「外せ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."

traits.locale_text: {n}手錠を引き寄せるようにして、ソロモーンはあなたを見上げ、厳しい口調で命じた。{/n}「外せ」

languages.text: {n}Tirando de su mano esposada, Solomorne te mira y ordena severamente:{/n} «Quítemela».
languages.original_text: {n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tirando de su mano esposada, Solomorne te mira y ordena severamente:{/n} «Quítemela».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙看着自己被铐住的手，抬头看着你，随后严厉地命令道。{/n}“快把它解开。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙看着自己被铐住的手，抬头看着你，随后严厉地命令道。{/n}“快把它解开。”

languages.text: {n}Kelepçeli elini çekiştirerek sana bakıyor ve sert bir tavırla emrediyor.{/n} "Çıkar şunu."
languages.original_text: {n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kelepçeli elini çekiştirerek sana bakıyor ve sert bir tavırla emrediyor.{/n} "Çıkar şunu."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne rüttelt an seiner gefesselten Hand und befiehlt dir streng:{/n} "Macht mich los."
languages.original_text: {n}Yanking his cuffed hand, Solomorne looks up at you and orders sternly,{/n} "Take it off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne rüttelt an seiner gefesselten Hand und befiehlt dir streng:{/n} "Macht mich los."
